Package sorcer.core.provider.cataloger.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SignatureDispatchment
    The Signature Dispatcher Interface allows us to abstract the interactions with cataloger or the provider.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BrowserModel
    The BrowserModel, in standard model-view-controller, is the model for the Cataloger User Interface service.
    BrowserWindow
    BrowserWindow is the main UI component of CatalogerUI and the providers integrated Task Manager Tab.
    CatalogerUI
    This is the UI for the Cataloger Service Browser.
    ContextEditWindow
    This class is used for the edit window displayed when a path or data node is modified.
    ContextNodeType
    This class represents a ContextNode and is used in the formation of the ContextTree for the UI.
    ContextScriptView
    This class implements the Context editing window, which is used in the Provider UI.
    ContextTree
    ContextTree is a JPanel that contains the Jtree as well as the TreeModel it represents.
    ContextView
    This class implements the Context editing window, which is used in the Cataloger UI and the task manager integrated into providers.
    SignatureDispatcherForCataloger
    Implementation of the SignatureDispatcherInterface to provide support for using Cataloger as a data source.
    SignatureDispatcherForProvider
    Implementation of the SignatureDispatcherInterface to provide support for using provider as a data source.
    SignatureView
    Builds the provider, interface, and method list, and puts them into a JPanel.
